prompts: Create a vibrant electric-type Pokemon with striking black and yellow features.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the energy of a storm, with electric limbs and a dynamic shape.
Design a unique creature that harnesses electricity, featuring a tree-like structure and sharp lines.
Show me a Pokemon with a humanoid design, glowing with electric energy and dark accents.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon that resembles a living power line, complete with energetic limbs.
Give me an electric-type Pokemon that looks like it could zap its foes with lightning.
Make a Pokemon that is both intimidating and lively, with a sleek black body and bright orange details.
